alternative.title: R
alternative.p: Recall the flickering threshold example from the previous activity. Here again is the output of the F-test:
We rejected Ho (p-value of .023) and concluded that CFF is related to eye color.
Here is a graph of the confidence intervals for each eye color:

image.alt: Blue: Mean = 28.167, StDev = 1.528, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (26.8, 29.3). Brown: Mean = 25.588, StDev = 1.364, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (24.1, 26.8) Green: Mean = 26.92, StDev = 1.843, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (25.5, 28.0)

alternative.title: Minitab
alternative.p: Recall the flickering threshold example from the previous activity. Here again is the Minitab output of the F-test:

image.alt:
One-Way ANOVA: CFF versus Color: Source: Color: DF = 2, SS = 23.00, MS = 11.50, F = 4.80, P = 0.023 Source: Error: DF = 16, SS= 38.31, MS = 2.39 Source: Total: DF = 18, SS = 61.31
S = 1.547, R-Sq = 37.51%, R-Sq(adj) = 29.70%
Blue: Mean = 28.167, StDev = 1.528, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (26.8, 29.3). Brown: Mean = 25.588, StDev = 1.364, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (24.1, 26.8) Green: Mean = 26.92, StDev = 1.843, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (25.5, 28.0)

alternative.p: We rejected Ho (p-value of .023) and concluded that CFF is related to eye color.

alternative.title: Excel 2007
alternative.p: Recall the flickering threshold example from the previous activity. Here again is the Excel output of the F-test:

image.alt:
Anova: Single Facotr SUMMARY: Blue: Count = 6, Sum = 169, Average = 28.16667, Variance = 2.33467 Brown: Count = 8, Sum = 204.7, Average = 25.5875, Variance = 1.86411 Green: Count = 5, Sum = 134.6, Average = 26.92, Variance = 3.397
ANOVA: Source of Variation: Between Groups: SS = 22.997, df = 2, MS = 11.49864, F = 4.80235, P-value = 0.02325, F-crit = 3.6337 Source of Variation: Within Groups: SS = 38.31, df = 16, MS = 2.39438 Total: SS = 61.307, df = 18

alternative.p: We rejected Ho (p-value of .023) and concluded that CFF is related to eye color.
Here is a graph of the confidence intervals for each eye color:

image.alt: Blue: Mean = 28.167, StDev = 1.528, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (26.8, 29.3). Brown: Mean = 25.588, StDev = 1.364, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (24.1, 26.8) Green: Mean = 26.92, StDev = 1.843, and the Individual 95% Confidence Interval for Mean is about (25.5, 28.0)
